reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

description.narrative: Zambia - TB/HIV - Churches Health Association of Zambia - CHAZ. This program has the following goals: Achieving zero new infections, zero HIV and AIDS related mortality and morbidity and zero discrimination. Avert 80,000 new infections by 2020. Avert 43,000 AIDS related deaths by 2020. To reduce the number of TB deaths in the population by 40% in 2021 compared to 2015. The objectives of this program are: 90% of PLHIV know their HIV status. 90% of people diagnosed with HIV enrolled on ART. 90% of PLHIV receiving ART achieve viral suppression. To reduce stigma and discrimination associated with HIV and AIDS. To improve access and utilisation of HIV and AIDS servcies by population groups most at risk
